title.text: Shanlax International Journal of Education s h a n l a x A Survey of Artificial Intelligence in Smart Phones and its Applications among the Students of Higher Education in and Around Chennai City
Shanlax International Journal of Education s h a n l a x A Survey of Artificial Intelligence in Smart Phones and its Applications among the Students of Higher Education in and Around Chennai City

abstract.text: In the current scenario, Smart Phones are one of the Artificial Intelligence devices regularly used by the students. The study aimed to know the utility of the SmartPhones in their day to day life, most useful applications and the valid security features of the Smart Phones and its impact among the Students at Higher Education level.
